title: Breaking Down the Capela-Covington Blockbuster Trade | Group Chat
description:
News of a four-team, 12-player trade revolving around Clint Capela and Robert Covington broke late Tuesday night, with numerous implications for the entire league. We discuss what this means for each team, as the trade deadline looms.

Host: Justin Verrier
Guest: Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
